summary.para: Creates a proxy for the specified remote interface.

param.name: pUnkOuter
param.para: A controlling interface; used for aggregation.

param.name: riid
param.para: The identifier of the interface to proxy.

param.name: ppProxy
param.para: A pointer to an interface to control marshaling.

param.name: ppv
param.para: A pointer to the interface specified by riid.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

remarks.para: The implementation of the interface must not delegate to the outer controlling IUnknown.

summary.para: Creates a stub for the remote use of the specified interface.

param.name: riid
param.para: The identifier of the interface for which a stub is to be created.

param.name: pUnkServer
param.para: A controlling interface; used for aggregation.

param.name: ppStub
param.para: A pointer to an interface pointer to control marshaling.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

summary.para: Provides custom methods for the creation of COM object proxies and stubs. This interface is not marshalable.
